google.name: google
google.description: Google is a multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

features.title: Search Anything, Anytime
features.description: Access the world's information at your fingertips with Google Search.

features.title: Stay Organized
features.description: Keep track of your tasks, events, and appointments with Google Calendar.

features.title: Collaborate Effortlessly
features.description: Work together with colleagues in real-time with Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides.

gmail.name: gmail
gmail.description: Gmail is a free email service developed by Google.

features.title: Send and Receive Emails
features.description: Effortlessly send and receive emails from anywhere in the world with Gmail.

features.title: Organize Your Inbox
features.description: Categorize and filter emails to keep your inbox organized and clutter-free.

features.title: Stay Connected
features.description: Sync your emails across devices to stay connected on the go.

telegram.name: telegram
telegram.description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging and voice over IP service.

features.title: Private and Secure Messaging
features.description: Communicate with friends and family securely with end-to-end encryption.

features.title: Share Media Files
features.description: Easily share photos, videos, and documents with your contacts.

features.title: Join Communities
features.description: Join groups and channels to connect with like-minded individuals and communities.

whatsapp.name: whatsApp
whatsapp.description: WhatsApp is a messaging app for smartphones that allows users to send and receive text messages, voice messages, and multimedia files.

features.title: Instant Messaging
features.description: Send text messages, voice messages, and multimedia files instantly to friends and family.

features.title: Voice and Video Calls
features.description: Make voice and video calls to contacts anywhere in the world for free.

features.title: Group Chats
features.description: Create group chats with up to 256 participants to stay connected with multiple contacts.

tiktok.name: tikTok
tiktok.description: TikTok is a social media platform for creating, sharing, and discovering short music videos.

features.title: Create Videos Quickly & Easily
features.description: With our Video Generator tool, you can create high quality videos in minutes. No video production expertise is required.

features.title: Track Performance with Pixel
features.description: Install the TikTok tracking pixel with the click of a button. it's so simple, no more manual installation or relying on a developer.

features.title: Boost Online Sales
features.description: Grow online sales by promoting your products to the audiences that are most interested in them.

twitter.name: twitter
twitter.description: Twitter is a social media platform for sharing news, thoughts, and ideas with a global audience.

features.title: Promoted Tweets
features.description: Boost your visibility with Promoted Tweets that appear in users' timelines.

features.title: Campaign Targeting
features.description: Target specific demographics, interests, and keywords to reach your audience.

features.title: Performance Tracking
features.description: Track the performance of your ad campaigns with real-time analytics.

facebook.name: facebook
facebook.description: Facebook is a social media platform for connecting with friends, family, and communities.

features.title: Ad Campaigns
features.description: Launch targeted ad campaigns to reach your audience on Facebook and Instagram.

features.title: Audience Targeting
features.description: Target specific demographics, interests, and behaviors to reach the right audience.

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Track ad performance and optimize campaigns with detailed analytics and insights.

mailchimp.name: mailchimp
mailchimp.description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform for small businesses.

features.title: Email Campaigns
features.description: Design and send beautiful email campaigns to your subscribers.

features.title: Audience Insights
features.description: Gain valuable insights into your audience with advanced analytics and reporting.

features.title: Marketing Automation
features.description: Automate your marketing campaigns to save time and increase efficiency.

snapchat.name: snapchat
snapchat.description: Connect with mailchimp to get your very own Email marketting and Drive traffic and sales with email and marketing automation.

features.title: Drive sales with automations
features.description: Generate more orders than email alone with automated welcome, abandoned cart, and re-engagement emails.

features.title: Leverage AI-powered insights
features.description: Get real-time recommendations to boost engagement and drive sales - powered by data from 12 billion daily emails.

features.title: Start for free, grow for less
features.description: Try our powerful slate of marketing and design tools for free to see how Mailchimp can supercharge your growth.

sendgrid.name: sendGrid
sendgrid.description: SendGrid is a cloud-based service for sending transactional and marketing emails.

features.title: Email Marketing
features.description: Create and send marketing emails to your subscribers with ease.

features.title: Automation
features.description: Automate your email campaigns based on user actions and behavior.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Track email engagement metrics and analyze campaign performance.
